items.q: What time are the classes held?
items.a: Classes start at 8:45 AM and finish at 5:00 PM.

items.q: What are the teachers’ qualifications? Can they provide quality education?
items.a: All our teachers have the highest qualification category and many years of experience. We carefully select the best specialists to ensure high quality education.

items.q: What is the quality of school meals?
items.a: We offer a balanced three-meal plan developed together with nutritionists. All dishes are prepared in our own kitchen from fresh, quality products.

items.q: Is there a guarantee of education quality? How soon will a student show progress?
items.a: We guarantee an individual approach to each student. Progress depends on many factors, but the first results are usually noticeable within 2-3 months of regular classes.

items.q: What sets you apart from other schools?
items.a: Our key difference is in-depth study of IT disciplines, project-based learning and the development of soft skills, preparing students for the professions of the future.
